Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Process.EXPLANATION: The rate at which process improvements lead to better efficiency.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Process.FORMULA: (Process Efficiency After Improvements - Process Efficiency Before Improvements) / Process Efficiency Before Improvements * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Process.EXPLANATION: The total financial savings achieved from process improvements.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Process.FORMULA: Total Cost Savings from Process Improvements

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Process.EXPLANATION: The reduction in the time required to complete a process or deliver a product.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Process.FORMULA: (Initial Lead Time - Final Lead Time) / Initial Lead Time * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Process.EXPLANATION: The total time from the start to the end of a process.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Process.FORMULA: Total Process Cycle Time / Number of Cycles

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Process.EXPLANATION: The percentage reduction in the number of defects over a period.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Process.FORMULA: ((Defect Rate Before Improvement - Defect Rate After Improvement) / Defect Rate Before Improvement) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Process.EXPLANATION: The level of employee involvement in suggesting and implementing process improvements.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Process.FORMULA: (Number of Employees Participating in Improvement Initiatives / Total Employees) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Process.EXPLANATION: The percentage of processes that adhere to standardized procedures.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Process.FORMULA: (Number of Standardized Processes / Total Number of Processes) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Process.EXPLANATION: The reduction in time a process is unavailable due to issues or maintenance.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Process.FORMULA: ((Downtime Before Improvement - Downtime After Improvement) / Downtime Before Improvement) * 100
